description.value:
The alchemistâ€™s unique dyes allow him to create lifelike images. If he expends an additional daily use of his bombs, the image he creates with the divine inks discovery also produces sound, smell, and heat, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.7rx66m98dwo18fy8]{Major Image}.

The alchemist must be at least 6th level and must have the divine inks and improved divine inks discoveries before selecting this discovery.
